welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Orsay, a charming and picturesque city known for its rich history and quaint streets lined with cafes and shops. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all that Orsay has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to serving regional and European flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited to a certain time or data usage.
